p: Unsafe abortion is one of the main causes of maternal mortality worldwide and the only one that is almost entirely preventable 5: it accounts for at least 22 800 deaths and over 7 million hospitalisations each year. 6 Thus, every safe abortion provided is potentially an unsafe abortion and maternal death averted. As healthcare systems around the world struggle to respond to COVID-19, it is important to not lose focus on all the SRH services we know save lives, which include contraception and SAC. 7
